name: CHARON (fletch arrow)
description:
A game made in Ren'Py for Ludum Dare 43, with writing by Robin (@kissesfingers) and art and programming by fletch arrow (@fletcharrow_). Think of it like a 'guess who' game, but a bit more intense.

An interplanetary flight suffers a critical power failure with six passengers' lives supported while in stasis. 
One VIP must survive. 
With limited information due to technical difficulties, a new 'automatic life assessment system' presents stored information about the passengers and must terminate those who can no longer be supported, one by one.

As the program, you must decide who survives.
